name: South Dungeon Hero v0.1
description:
Hello! Welcome to the beta of SDH!
Press the coin to play, move with arrows and press X (or y for the necromancer) to fight.
Clic on "HERO" to change of HERO and on "CREDIT" to see the credits.
Enjoy!

Credits: Code game by me
Sprites and tileset by 0*72 : https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
Game created with Scratch 2.0

v0.1 beta: 3 hero and 2 monsters, no musics or sounds
v0.2: 3 hero and 4 monstrers, no musics or sounds but you can die now! Wall in the map and less glitchs.
Event: Halloween is COMING!: new heros and monsters are coming soon! Coin system too!

Halloween event v1: Necromancer, Lizard and new monsters.
